resources.string: Apple is known for its innovative technology.
Asus offers a range of laptops and smartphones.
LG is a leading manufacturer of electronics.
Nokia is famous for its durable phones.
Poco is known for its affordable yet powerful phones.
Realme offers budget-friendly smartphones with great features.
Samsung is a global leader in smartphone technology.
Vivo focuses on camera technology in smartphones.
Xiaomi offers high-quality smartphones at competitive prices.
